verses.verse: Now Moses <S%H4872><s%> was pasturing <S%H7462><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Jethro <S%H3503><s%> his father-in-law, the priest <S%H3548><s%> of Midian; <S%H4080><s%> and he led <S%H5090><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> to the west <S%H310><s%> side <S%H310><s%> of the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Horeb, <S%H2722><s%> the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to him in a blazing <S%H3852><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of a bush; <S%H5572><s%> and he looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> the bush <S%H5572><s%> was burning <S%H1197><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> yet the bush <S%H5572><s%> was not consumed. <S%H398><s%>

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "I must turn <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> marvelous <S%H1419><s%> sight, <S%H4758><s%> why <S%H4069><s%> the bush <S%H5572><s%> is not burned <S%H1197><s%> up."

When the Lord <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that he turned <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> to look, <S%H7200><s%> God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to him from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the bush, <S%H5572><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Moses! <S%H4872><s%>" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Here <S%H2009><s%> I am."

Then He said, <S%H559><s%> "Do not come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> here; <S%H1988><s%> remove <S%H5394><s%> your sandals <S%H5275><s%> from your feet, <S%H7272><s%> for the place <S%H4725><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> you are standing <S%H5975><s%> is holy <S%H6944><s%> ground. <S%H127><s%>"

He said <S%H559><s%> also, "I am the God <S%H430><s%> of your father, the God <S%H1><s%> of Abraham, <S%H430><s%> the God <S%H85><s%> of Isaac, <S%H430><s%> and the God <S%H3327><s%> of Jacob. <S%H430><s%>" Then Moses <S%H3290><s%> hid <S%H4872><s%> his face, <S%H5641><s%> for he was afraid <S%H6440><s%> to look <S%H3372><s%> at God. <S%H5027><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "I have surely <S%H7200><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> the affliction <S%H6040><s%> of My people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and have given <S%H8085><s%> heed <S%H8085><s%> to their cry <S%H6818><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of their taskmasters, <S%H5065><s%> for I am aware <S%H3045><s%> of their sufferings. <S%H4341><s%>

"So I have come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> them from the power <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and to bring <S%H5927><s%> them up from that land <S%H776><s%> to a good <S%H2896><s%> and spacious <S%H7342><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> to a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> of the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> and the Hittite <S%H2850><s%> and the Amorite <S%H567><s%> and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%> and the Hivite <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite. <S%H2983><s%>

"And now, <S%H6258><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the cry <S%H6818><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> to Me; furthermore, <S%H1571><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> the oppression <S%H3906><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> are oppressing <S%H3905><s%> them.

"Therefore, come <S%H1980><s%> now, <S%H6258><s%> and I will send <S%H7971><s%> you to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> so that you may bring <S%H3318><s%> My people, <S%H5971><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

But Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> "Who <S%H4310><s%> am I, that I should go <S%H1980><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and that I should bring <S%H3318><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>?"

And He said, <S%H559><s%> "Certainly <S%H3588><s%> I will be with you, and this <S%H2088><s%> shall be the sign <S%H226><s%> to you that it is I who have sent <S%H7971><s%> you: when you have brought <S%H3318><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> you shall worship <S%H5647><s%> God <S%H430><s%> at this <S%H2088><s%> mountain. <S%H2022><s%>"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am going <S%H935><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and I shall say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'The God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers has sent <S%H1><s%> me to you.' Now they may say <S%H7971><s%> to me, 'What <S%H559><s%> is His name <S%H4100><s%>?' What <S%H8034><s%> shall I say <S%H4100><s%> to them?"

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "I AM <S%H1961><s%> WHO <S%H834><s%> I AM <S%H1961><s%>"; and He said, <S%H559><s%> "Thus <S%H3541><s%> you shall say <S%H559><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'I AM <S%H1961><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to you.'"

And God, <S%H430><s%> furthermore, <S%H5750><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Thus <S%H3541><s%> you shall say <S%H559><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'The Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers, the God <S%H1><s%> of Abraham, <S%H430><s%> the God <S%H85><s%> of Isaac, <S%H430><s%> and the God <S%H3327><s%> of Jacob, <S%H430><s%> has sent <S%H3290><s%> me to you.' This <S%H7971><s%> is My name <S%H2088><s%> forever, <S%H8034><s%> and this <S%H5769><s%> is My memorial-name to all <S%H2088><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>

"Go <S%H1980><s%> and gather <S%H622><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> together, and say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'The Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers, the God <S%H1><s%> of Abraham, <S%H430><s%> Isaac <S%H85><s%> and Jacob, <S%H3327><s%> has appeared <S%H3290><s%> to me, saying, <S%H7200><s%> "I am <S%H559><s%> indeed <S%H6485><s%> concerned <S%H6485><s%> about you and what has been done <S%H6485><s%> to you in Egypt. <S%H6213><s%>

"So I said, <S%H559><s%> I will bring <S%H5927><s%> you up out of the affliction <S%H6040><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> and the Hittite <S%H2850><s%> and the Amorite <S%H567><s%> and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%> and the Hivite <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite, <S%H2983><s%> to a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>"'

"And they will pay <S%H8085><s%> heed <S%H8085><s%> to what <S%H6963><s%> you say; <S%H6963><s%> and you with the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and you will say <S%H559><s%> to him, 'The Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> has met <S%H7136><s%> with us. So now, <S%H6258><s%> please, <S%H4994><s%> let us go <S%H1980><s%> a three <S%H7969><s%> days' journey <S%H1870><s%> into the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> that we may sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>'
"But I know <S%H3045><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will not permit <S%H5414><s%> you to go, <S%H1980><s%> except <S%H3808><s%> under compulsion. <S%H2389><s%> <S%H3027><s%>

"So I will stretch <S%H7971><s%> out My hand, <S%H3027><s%> and strike <S%H5221><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> My miracles <S%H6381><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I shall do <S%H6213><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of it; and after <S%H310><s%> that he will let you go. <S%H7971><s%>

"And I will grant <S%H5414><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Egyptians; <S%H4714><s%> and it shall be that when you go, <S%H1980><s%> you will not go <S%H1980><s%> empty-handed.

"But every woman <S%H802><s%> shall ask <S%H7592><s%> of her neighbor <S%H7934><s%> and the woman who lives <S%H1481><s%> in her house, <S%H1004><s%> articles <S%H3627><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> and articles <S%H3627><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and clothing; <S%H8071><s%> and you will put <S%H7760><s%> them on your sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%> Thus you will plunder <S%H5337><s%> the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>"
